title: My Wife Is Hella Aggressive
itunes:title: My Wife Is Hella Aggressive
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 35 years old and my wife is 34. We’ve been married for four years and we have a toddler. My wife is 5’1” and she weighs about 125lbs but her mouth is as big as a lioness’ mouth. Everything she does is big. She talks loud and laughs loud so I’ve learned to sit back and let her do her thing. She says I get things wrong or I don’t remember all of the details, so she will yell for me to shut up and let her talk when we are around our friends....................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 35 years old and my wife is 34. We’ve been married for four years and we have a toddler. My wife is 5’1” and she weighs about 125lbs but her mouth is as big as a lioness’ mouth. Everything she does is big. She talks loud and laughs loud so I’ve learned to sit back and let her do her thing. She says I get things wrong or I don’t remember all of the details, so she will yell for me to shut up and let her talk when we are around our friends....................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
